item.title: In praise of inconsistency: Ditching weekly posts
item.description: On moving away from weekly blog posts in favour of deeper inconsistent articles and LinkedIn engagement.

item.title: New decade, new tagline: Data & AI for Impact
item.description: Shifting focus to ‘Data & AI for Impact’, with more startup-related content, increased posting frequency, and deeper audience engagement.

item.title: My rediscovery of quiet writing on the open web
item.description: Reflections on publishing on this website: Writing publicly to share thoughts and documentation beats chasing views and likes.

item.title: Making a TIL section with Hugo and PaperMod
item.description: How I added a Today I Learned section to my Hugo site with the PaperMod theme.
